Method Detail

downloadDocument

int downloadDocument(OverlayKey key,
                     java.util.List<TransInfo> peers,
                     OperationCallback callback)
Calling this method will make the strategy to download the document identified by the given key from the given peers. Depending on the strategy implementation one, some or all of the provided peers will be involved.

Parameters:
key - - identifies the requested document
peers - - addresses of hosts which should have copies of the requested document
callback - - callback for this operation
Returns:
operation id

getTransInfo

TransInfo getTransInfo()
The address at which this strategy waits for incoming download requests.

Returns:
trans info address of this component.
